sentences.en: His profession was that logic was not the sole criterion of art.
sentences.cn: 他的主张是逻辑并不是艺术的唯一标准.

sentences.en: Practice is the sole criterion for testing truth.
sentences.cn: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准.

sentences.en: Practice is the sole criterion of truth.
sentences.cn: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准。

sentences.en: Senior managers stipulated work-life balance as their main criterion when choosing jobs.
sentences.cn: 高级经理人把工作与生活的平衡作为择业的主要标准。

sentences.en: The acceptance criterion is usually set empirically based on the type of device being fabricated.
sentences.cn: 合格标准一般是根据制作器件的类型由经验确定.

sentences.en: the criteria we use to select candidates
sentences.cn: 我们挑选候选人的标准

sentences.en: The criterion for gravitational contraction set by Equations 3.4 is signficantly weaker for more massive clouds.
sentences.cn: 由(3.4)式建立的引力收缩判据,对质量较大的云是很牵强的.

sentences.en: The criterion of irreversibility is also not decisive for the interpretation of demarcation of developmental homeostasis.
sentences.cn: 不可逆标准对于解释或区分发育同形作用也是不明确的.

sentences.en: The iterative process may be continued until some criterion for convergence is met.
sentences.cn: 这种迭代步骤可继续下去,直到符合某种收敛要求为止.

sentences.en: The main criterion is value for money.
sentences.cn: 主要的标准是钱要用得划算。

sentences.en: The most distinctive criterion for identifying the nature of events is moveout.
sentences.cn: 识别波至本质的最为显著的准则是时差.

sentences.en: The most important criterion for entry is that applicants must design and make their own work.
sentences.cn: 最重要的参赛标准是申请者必须设计并制作自己的作品。

sentences.en: The optimal systems differ according to the criterion chosen.
sentences.cn: 按照所用准则之不同,最佳化系统便不同.

sentences.en: This is the final criterion of veterinary practice.
sentences.cn: 这就是兽医业务的最终目标.

sentences.en: This is the most distinctive criterion for identifying the nature of events.
sentences.cn: 这是识别事物本质的最为显著的准则.

sentences.en: We must look for another system state function to find the equilibrium criterion.
sentences.cn: 为了求得平衡判据,我们必须寻找体系的另外的状态函数.

words.tran_cn: （批评判断的）[标准]标准；准则；规范；准据

phrases.tran_cn: 收敛性判定准则；收敛性判据
设计标准；设计准则；设计规范
失效准则；故障判据；抗剪强度破坏准则
断裂判据，断裂准则；断裂指标
最优性判别；最优性准则

trans.tran_en: a standard that you use to judge something or make a decision about something
